REBATE MANAGEMENT
Set Up an Experience Cloud Site for Rebate Members

Use Experience Cloud to give your partners access to Rebate Management or Ship and Debit Process Management. Create an Experience Cloud site where partners can view the rebate program and payout details and submit their claims and proof-of-sale documents. You can use the predefined Manufacturing Experience Cloud template to create a site for partners. You can also use an existing site in your org, or create a site from scratch and add the Rebate Management or Ship and Debit Process Management objects to your Experience Cloud site.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management or Ship and Debit Process Management enabled.


USER PERMISSIONS
NEEDED
To create an Experience Cloud site	Create and Set Up Experiences AND View Setup and Configuration
To set up Rebate Management OR Ship and Debit Process Management	
Rebate Management Admin permission set
OR Ship and Debit Process Management Admin permission set

To set up sites, ensure that you have enabled Experience Cloud in your org and the Partner User profile is set up. See Set Up an Experience Cloud Site for more details on the configuration of a site.

To use the predefined Manufacturing Experience Cloud template, follow these steps.

From Setup, enter Sites in the Quick Find box, and select All Sites under Digital Experiences.
Click New.
Select the Manufacturing template and click Get Started.
Enter a name for the site and click Create. Also enter the domain name.
On the landing page, click Builder to customize and design the workspace for partners.
Click Publish to finalize your changes.

SEE ALSO
Manage Rebate and Ship and Debit Claims
